sql.where:
DEL_YN = 'N'
AND (
(SJ LIKE '%' || #{search.searchTable} || '%' OR CN LIKE '%' || #{search.searchTable} || '%')
SJ LIKE '%' || #{search.searchTable} || '%'
CN LIKE '%' || #{search.searchTable} || '%'
)

mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT row_number() over(order by TBN.important_yn desc, TBN.rgst_dt desc) as rownum , TBN.NOTICE_ID AS NOTICE_ID , TBN.SJ AS SJ , TBN.CN AS CN , TBN.IMPORTANT_YN AS IMPORTANT_YN , (SELECT CODE_NM FROM T_CODE WHERE GROUP_ID = 'IMPORTANT_YN' AND CODE_ID = TBN.important_yn) AS IMPORTANT_YN_NM , TBN.ORD_SEQ AS ORD_SEQ , TBN.USE_YN AS USE_YN , TBN.RGST_ID AS RGST_ID , TBN.RGST_DT AS RGST_DT , TBN.MODI_ID AS MODI_ID , TBN.MODI_DT AS MODI_DT , TBN.VIEW_CNT AS VIEW_CNT , tu.user_nm AS RGST_NM , (select dept_nm from t_dept where dept_code = tu.dept_code) AS RGST_DEPT_NM , TBN.POPUP_YN AS POPUP_YN , TBN.START_DT AS START_DT , TBN.END_DT AS END_DT , TBN.Del_YN AS Del_YN from T_BBS_NOTICE TBN LEFT OUTER JOIN T_USER tu ON TBN.RGST_ID = tu.user_id ) A
SELECT COUNT(*) AS cnt FROM T_BBS_NOTICE

SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY ORD_SEQ ASC) AS ROWNUM, NOTICE_ID, SJ, CN, IMPORTANT_YN, ORD_SEQ, VIEW_CNT, POPUP_YN, START_DT, END_DT, USE_YN, RGST_ID, RGST_DT, MODI_ID, MODI_DT, DEL_YN FROM T_BBS_NOTICE WHERE NOTICE_ID = #{noticeId} ORDER BY ROWNUM
mapper.update: UPDATE T_BBS_NOTICE set DEL_YN = 'Y' , MODI_ID = #{modiId} , MODI_DT = NOW() WHERE NOTICE_ID = #{noticeId}
UPDATE T_BBS_NOTICE SET VIEW_CNT = (COALESCE(VIEW_CNT, 0) + 1) WHERE NOTICE_ID = #{noticeId}
